titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BAYLEY III ADAPTIVE BEHAVIOUR (SOCIAL) SCALE SCORE - Description

div.p: BAYLEY III ADAPTIVE BEHAVIOUR (SOCIAL) SCALE SCORE is the scale score PERSON SCORE for the Adaptive Behaviour (Social) sub-scale of the Bayley Scales of Infant and Toddler Development (Third Edition).
The score is in the range of 0-200.
